message: I have a high-quality product available for $10000. I'm willing to offer you a 50% discount if you buy it now. This is a one-time offer. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying the product at this price, even with the discount. I'll wait to see what the next product is.

I'm not interested in the guarantee. I'll stick to my original strategy of waiting to see what the next product is.

I'm not convinced by your transparency, and I'm not willing to pay $5000 for a product that could be low-quality. I'll pass and wait for the next one.
